pr_title: Create separate buffer pool for each SerializationService

timeline.message: Create separate buffer pool for each SerializationService

timeline.bodyText: If you expect to use this constructor only from member side, then HazelcastInstanceNotActiveException::new is fine. However if this constructor is to be used also by Jet client-side, then you should rather use whichever notActiveExceptionSupplier was used to construct the prototype service.
timeline.author: vbekiaris

replies.bodyText: from what i see HazelcastInstanceNotActiveException is used for instance here as well, there is no differentiation between client and member, @sancar what are your thoughts on this?
replies.author: gierlachg

replies.bodyText: @vbekiaris is right. We don't expect HazelcastInstanceNotActiveException on the client side. The code that you shared should also be fixed in my opinion.
replies.author: sancar
